import React, { Component } from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free' import { Table } from 'reactstrap' export default class DataTable extends Component { state = { data: this.props.data } /*TODO: -- Function to strip the data into the table values -- data structure : Headers + values */ render() { return (
# User Type First Name Last Name Username
1 Mark Otto @mdo

) } }
